A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is fundamentally broken.
The forced attempts at humor\, the bizarre and unbalanced way the heroes and villains operate under completely different rules (Only the good guys' ships have shields? REALLY??)\, and the way so many of the dangling plot threads from 'The Force Awakens' are just thrown away with a visible contempt by the director... all of this combines to leave me sort of hating this movie.
And that's horrible\, because I LOVE Star Wars.
But having seen this\, my faith in this franchise is severely damaged\, to the point where I'm unsure if I'll be paying to see the next one.
